text: Togo dahi dangada di langi ga ili dana buu ‘trumpet’. Gei di uwa hadu magalillili mo dono ahi, e unugi gi nia dodo gaa doo iha gi hongo henuailala. Dahi baahi e dolu o henuailala gaa wwele, ge dahi baahi e dolu o nia laagau gaa wwele, gei nia geinga ala i golo la gaa wwele labelaa.8.7 Exodus 9.23-25; Ezekiel 38.22
